title: Drugs minister Elena Whitham quits due to post-traumatic stress

title: Scottish Government drugs minister Elena Whitham resigns for health reasons
description: The Scottish Government’s drugs and alcohol policy minister Elena Whitham has resigned for health reasons. The SNP minister said that over the last year she had “experienced a series of events leading to post traumatic stress”. She was appointed to her current role in Humza Yousaf’s Government in March last year.
